customer_addr:
5210 N W 110th Avenue
Coral Springs, FL 33076

citations.narrative:
A social media post shows a ring-tailed lemur hanging from a loosely mounted ceiling fan. Licensee verified that she
allows the lemur to climb on the ceiling fan and did post the video on social media. A ceiling fan is not an appropriate
climbing structure for a non- human primate as it could fall from the ceiling and cause serious harm or injury. Primary
enclosures must be designed and constructed to protect the non-human primate from injury. Correct by April 13, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
Additional Inspectors:
GWENDALYN MAGINNIS, Nonhuman Primate Field Specialist n

narrative:
3.80(a)(2)(ii) 
   
Primary enclosures. 
A social media post shows a ring-tailed lemur hanging from a loosely mounted ceiling fan. Licensee verified that she 
allows the lemur to climb on the ceiling fan and did post the video on social media. A ceiling fan is not an appropriate 
climbing structure for a non- human primate as it could fall from the ceiling and cause serious harm or injury. Primary 
enclosures must be designed and constructed to protect the non-human primate from injury. Correct by April 13, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
GWENDALYN MAGINNIS, Nonhuman Primate Field Specialist n
